oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STABILITY OF ROCK ON BEACHES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schiereck, Gerrit J.
Fontijn, Henri L.
Grote, Wout V.
Sistermans, Paul G.J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rock beach
beach stability
rock stability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Stability relations for rock on a mild slope are derived and compared with experimental results. It appears that for non-breaking waves the stability on a mild slope can be described with existing relations for stability on a horizontal bottom in oscillatory flow. For breaking waves, no existing relation can be used and a provisional empirical design rule was established. The results can be applied in designing outfall protections.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 24 (1994): Proceedings of 24th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Kobe, Japan, 1994.
